title: Adult Basic Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program Using Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Asynchronous online learning environment applying gamification strategies for adult learners struggling with job performance due to weak math foundations

learning_goals: Learners achieve ≥80% formative assessment pass rates by utilizing gamification elements (experience points, level-ups, badges).
Learners form continuous learning habits by accessing the LMS ≥3 times weekly through weekly quest missions.
Learners complete team assignments with a group average score of ≥75 points through collaborative problem-solving missions.
Learners demonstrate ≥30% improvement in math concept comprehension compared to pre-assessments after participating in gamified learning activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
